item.title: FunBoexEasyEnum by OffSec
item.description: On a lazy Saturday morning, August 17, 2024, I embarked on a thrilling adventure in the world of Offensive Security, tackling the FunboxEasyEnum box on the Proving Grounds Play labs. This easy-level warmup machine was the perfect way to kick-start my journey, and I’m excited to share my experience with you. Port Scan ðŸ”—From port scan we got: nmap -sC -sV -A -T4 -p- 192.168.235.132 -o scan Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.
